name: tempestremap

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
TempestRemap is a conservative, consistent and monotone remapping
package for arbitrary grid geometry with support for finite volumes and
finite elements. There is still quite a bit of work to be done, but any
feedback is appreciated on the software in its current form

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description:
AMD Optimized BLIS. BLIS is a portable software framework for
instantiating high-performance BLAS-like dense linear algebra libraries.
The framework was designed to isolate essential kernels of computation
that, when optimized, immediately enable optimized implementations of
most of its commonly used and computationally intensive operations.
LICENSING INFORMATION: By downloading, installing and using this
software, you agree to the terms and conditions of the AMD AOCL-BLIS
license agreement. You may obtain a copy of this license agreement from
https://www.amd.com/en/developer/aocl/dense/eula/blas-4-2-eula.html
https://www.amd.com/en/developer/aocl/dense/eula/blas-eula.html

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description:
NVPL LAPACK (NVIDIA Performance Libraries LAPACK) is part of NVIDIA
Performance Libraries that provides standard Fortran 90 LAPACK APIs.

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependencies.name: netcdf-c
dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the C distribution.
